title: Sex Font? (Sorry!)
content:
Okay, I can't believe I'm asking this...but does anyone know of a dingbat set that shows the various sexual positions? I've seen one free one on Dafont.com but it's not very good and I need something I can officially license.

Thanks in advance..  
Scott
author: macgee

comments.content: You saw [this,](http://web.archive.org/web/20110313032740/http:/typographi.com/001085.php) right? It isn't explicitly sexual, but it is nude. Not a font though.

There used to be a display font called Body but, like the one Carl linked to, it just used the human figure to create the letterforms, didn't exactly show sexual positions - unless you counted the N which showed (inadvertently?) a guy giving a handjob to another guy. I looked for it digitally awhile back but couldn't find it.
Hmmm...not quite what I need. Thanks though! I'm thinking of using one of those programs like Poser to create my own. Yes, I feel like a perv.
Luc Devroye has a listing of [erotic fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20110313032740/http:/cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/erotic.html) on his site...
